QuestData.Title: Out of Sprite
QuestData.Description: Just to be clear, what happened was an accident. What I did, I did for INDUSTRY!$b$bThere was no way I could have known that a sprite invasion would happen at any time, or that one of them would try to eat my new "Pan's Miracle Gro" formula.$b$bNow not only do they have a big sprite leading them, but he's one angry beast.$b$bIf I pay you, will you take him out?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: What happens when a forest sprite gets their hands on Pan's Miracle Gro formula.
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh why? Why did I have to tamper with the natural order of things? All I wanted was to make these grains grow faster and more numerous.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that that's over I have some ideas on how to make a new concoction. We'll see.$b$bThank you for your help. Here is your reward.
